00112 int
00113 Cudd_DebugCheck(
00114   DdManager * table)
00115 {
00116     unsigned int i;
00117     int         j,count;
00118     int         slots;
00119 #ifdef __osf__
00120 #pragma pointer_size save
00121 #pragma pointer_size short
00122 #endif
00123     DdNode      **nodelist,*f;
00124 #ifdef __osf__
00125 #pragma pointer_size restore
00126 #endif
00127     st_table    *edgeTable;     /* stores internal ref count for each node */
00128     st_generator        *gen;
00129     int         flag = 0;
00130     int         totalNode;
00131     int         deadNode;
00132     int         index;
00133     
00134 
00135     edgeTable = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp,st_ptrhash);
00136     if (edgeTable == NULL) return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00137 
00138     /* Check the BDD/ADD subtables. */
00139     for (i = 0; i < (unsigned) table->size; i++) {
00140         index = table->invperm[i];
00141         if (i != (unsigned) table->perm[index]) {
00142             (void) fprintf(stdout,"Permutation corrupted: invperm[%d] = %d\t perm[%d] = %d\n", i, index, index, table->perm[index]);
00143         }
00144         nodelist = table->subtables[i].nodelist;
00145         slots = table->subtables[i].slots;
00146 
00147         totalNode = 0;
00148         deadNode = 0;
00149         for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {   /* for each subtable slot */
00150             f = nodelist[j];
00151             while (f != NULL) {
00152                 totalNode++;
00153                 if (cuddT(f) != NULL && cuddE(f) != NULL && f->ref != 0) { 
00154                     if ((int) f->index != index) {
00155                         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: node has illegal index\n");
00156                         cuddPrintNode(f);
00157                         flag = 1;
00158                     }
00159                     if ((unsigned) cuddI(table,cuddT(f)->index) <= i ||
00160                         (unsigned) cuddI(table,Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f))->index)
00161                         <= i) {
00162                         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: node has illegal children\n");
00163                         cuddPrintNode(f);
00164                         flag = 1;
00165                     }
00166                     if (Cudd_Regular(cuddT(f)) != cuddT(f)) {
00167                         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: node has illegal form\n");
00168                         cuddPrintNode(f);
00169                         flag = 1;
00170                     }
00171                     if (cuddT(f) == cuddE(f)) {
00172                         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: node has identical children\n");
00173                         cuddPrintNode(f);
00174                         flag = 1;
00175                     }
00176                     if (cuddT(f)->ref == 0 || Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f))->ref == 0) {
00177                         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: live node has dead children\n");
00178                         cuddPrintNode(f);
00179                         flag =1;
00180                     }
00181                     /* Increment the internal reference count for the
00182                     ** then child of the current node.
00183                     */
00184                     if (st_lookup(edgeTable,(char *)cuddT(f),(char **)&count)) {
00185                         count++;
00186                     } else {
00187                         count = 1;
00188                     }
00189                     if (st_insert(edgeTable,(char *)cuddT(f),
00190                     (char *)(long)count) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00191                         st_free_table(edgeTable);
00192                         return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00193                     }
00194                 
00195                     /* Increment the internal reference count for the
00196                     ** else child of the current node.
00197                     */
00198                     if (st_lookup(edgeTable,(char *)Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f)),(char **)&count)) {
00199                         count++;
00200                     } else {
00201                         count = 1;
00202                     }
00203                     if (st_insert(edgeTable,(char *)Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f)),
00204                     (char *)(long)count) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00205                         st_free_table(edgeTable);
00206                         return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00207                     }
00208                 } else if (cuddT(f) != NULL && cuddE(f) != NULL && f->ref == 0) {
00209                     deadNode++;
00210 #if 0
00211                     debugCheckParent(table,f);
00212 #endif
00213                 } else {
00214                     fprintf(stdout,"Error: node has illegal Then or Else pointers\n");
00215                     cuddPrintNode(f);
00216                     flag = 1;
00217                 }
00218 
00219                 f = f->next;
00220             }   /* for each element of the collision list */
00221         }       /* for each subtable slot */
00222 
00223         if ((unsigned) totalNode != table->subtables[i].keys) {
00224             fprintf(stdout,"Error: wrong number of total nodes\n");
00225             flag = 1;
00226         }
00227         if ((unsigned) deadNode != table->subtables[i].dead) {
00228             fprintf(stdout,"Error: wrong number of dead nodes\n");
00229             flag = 1;
00230         }
00231     }   /* for each BDD/ADD subtable */
00232 
00233     /* Check the ZDD subtables. */
00234     for (i = 0; i < (unsigned) table->sizeZ; i++) {
00235         index = table->invpermZ[i];
00236         if (i != (unsigned) table->permZ[index]) {
00237             (void) fprintf(stdout,"Permutation corrupted: invpermZ[%d] = %d\t permZ[%d] = %d in ZDD\n", i, index, index, table->permZ[index]);
00238         }
00239         nodelist = table->subtableZ[i].nodelist;
00240         slots = table->subtableZ[i].slots;
00241 
00242         totalNode = 0;
00243         deadNode = 0;
00244         for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {   /* for each subtable slot */
00245             f = nodelist[j];
00246             while (f != NULL) {
00247                 totalNode++;
00248                 if (cuddT(f) != NULL && cuddE(f) != NULL && f->ref != 0) { 
00249                     if ((int) f->index != index) {
00250                         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: ZDD node has illegal index\n");
00251                         cuddPrintNode(f);
00252                         flag = 1;
00253                     }
00254                     if (Cudd_IsComplement(cuddT(f)) ||
00255                         Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(f))) {
00256                         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: ZDD node has complemented children\n");
00257                         cuddPrintNode(f);
00258                         flag = 1;
00259                     }
00260                     if ((unsigned) cuddIZ(table,cuddT(f)->index) <= i ||
00261                     (unsigned) cuddIZ(table,cuddE(f)->index) <= i) {
00262                         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: ZDD node has illegal children\n");
00263                         cuddPrintNode(f);
00264                         cuddPrintNode(cuddT(f));
00265                         cuddPrintNode(cuddE(f));
00266                         flag = 1;
00267                     }
00268                     if (cuddT(f) == DD_ZERO(table)) {
00269                         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: ZDD node has zero then child\n");
00270                         cuddPrintNode(f);
00271                         flag = 1;
00272                     }
00273                     if (cuddT(f)->ref == 0 || cuddE(f)->ref == 0) {
00274                         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: ZDD live node has dead children\n");
00275                         cuddPrintNode(f);
00276                         flag =1;
00277                     }
00278                     /* Increment the internal reference count for the
00279                     ** then child of the current node.
00280                     */
00281                     if (st_lookup(edgeTable,(char *)cuddT(f),(char **)&count)) {
00282                         count++;
00283                     } else {
00284                         count = 1;
00285                     }
00286                     if (st_insert(edgeTable,(char *)cuddT(f),
00287                     (char *)(long)count) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00288                         st_free_table(edgeTable);
00289                         return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00290                     }
00291                 
00292                     /* Increment the internal reference count for the
00293                     ** else child of the current node.
00294                     */
00295                     if (st_lookup(edgeTable,(char *)cuddE(f),(char **)&count)) {
00296                         count++;
00297                     } else {
00298                         count = 1;
00299                     }
00300                     if (st_insert(edgeTable,(char *)cuddE(f),
00301                     (char *)(long)count) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00302                         st_free_table(edgeTable);
00303                         return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00304                     }
00305                 } else if (cuddT(f) != NULL && cuddE(f) != NULL && f->ref == 0) {
00306                     deadNode++;
00307 #if 0
00308                     debugCheckParent(table,f);
00309 #endif
00310                 } else {
00311                     fprintf(stdout,"Error: ZDD node has illegal Then or Else pointers\n");
00312                     cuddPrintNode(f);
00313                     flag = 1;
00314                 }
00315 
00316                 f = f->next;
00317             }   /* for each element of the collision list */
00318         }       /* for each subtable slot */
00319 
00320         if ((unsigned) totalNode != table->subtableZ[i].keys) {
00321             fprintf(stdout,"Error: wrong number of total nodes in ZDD\n");
00322             flag = 1;
00323         }
00324         if ((unsigned) deadNode != table->subtableZ[i].dead) {
00325             fprintf(stdout,"Error: wrong number of dead nodes in ZDD\n");
00326             flag = 1;
00327         }
00328     }   /* for each ZDD subtable */
00329 
00330     /* Check the constant table. */
00331     nodelist = table->constants.nodelist;
00332     slots = table->constants.slots;
00333 
00334     totalNode = 0;
00335     deadNode = 0;
00336     for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00337         f = nodelist[j];
00338         while (f != NULL) {
00339             totalNode++;
00340             if (f->ref != 0) { 
00341                 if (f->index != CUDD_MAXINDEX) {
00342                     fprintf(stdout,"Error: node has illegal index\n");
00343 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00344                     fprintf(stdout,"       node 0x%lx, id = %d, ref = %d, value = %g\n",(unsigned long)f,f->index,f->ref,cuddV(f));
00345 #else
00346                     fprintf(stdout,"       node 0x%x, id = %d, ref = %d, value = %g\n",(unsigned)f,f->index,f->ref,cuddV(f));
00347 #endif
00348                     flag = 1;
00349                 }
00350             } else {
00351                 deadNode++;
00352             }
00353             f = f->next;
00354         }
00355     }
00356     if ((unsigned) totalNode != table->constants.keys) {
00357         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: wrong number of total nodes in constants\n");
00358         flag = 1;
00359     }
00360     if ((unsigned) deadNode != table->constants.dead) {
00361         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: wrong number of dead nodes in constants\n");
00362         flag = 1;
00363     }
00364     gen = st_init_gen(edgeTable);
00365     while (st_gen(gen,(char **)&f,(char **)&count)) {
00366         if (count > (int)(f->ref) && f->ref != DD_MAXREF) {
00367 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00368             fprintf(stdout,"ref count error at node 0x%lx, count = %d, id = %d, ref = %d, then = 0x%lx, else = 0x%lx\n",(unsigned long)f,count,f->index,f->ref,(unsigned long)cuddT(f),(unsigned long)cuddE(f));
00369 #else
00370             fprintf(stdout,"ref count error at node 0x%x, count = %d, id = %d, ref = %d, then = 0x%x, else = 0x%x\n",(unsigned)f,count,f->index,f->ref,(unsigned)cuddT(f),(unsigned)cuddE(f));
00371 #endif
00372             debugFindParent(table,f);
00373             flag = 1;
00374         }
00375     }
00376     st_free_gen(gen);
00377     st_free_table(edgeTable);
00378 
00379     return (flag);
00380 
00381 } /* end of Cudd_DebugCheck */

00383 
00407 int
00408 Cudd_CheckKeys(
00409   DdManager * table)
00410 {
00411     int size;
00412     int i,j;
00413 #ifdef __osf__
00414 #pragma pointer_size save
00415 #pragma pointer_size short
00416 #endif
00417     DdNode **nodelist;
00418 #ifdef __osf__
00419 #pragma pointer_size restore
00420 #endif
00421     DdNode *node;
00422     DdSubtable *subtable;
00423     int keys;
00424     int dead;
00425     int count = 0;
00426     int totalKeys = 0;
00427     int totalSlots = 0;
00428     int totalDead = 0;
00429     int nonEmpty = 0;
00430     unsigned int slots;
00431     int logSlots;
00432     int shift;
00433 
00434     size = table->size;
00435 
00436     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00437         subtable = &(table->subtables[i]);
00438         nodelist = subtable->nodelist;
00439         keys = subtable->keys;
00440         dead = subtable->dead;
00441         totalKeys += keys;
00442         slots = subtable->slots;
00443         shift = subtable->shift;
00444         logSlots = sizeof(int) * 8 - shift;
00445         if (((slots >> logSlots) << logSlots) != slots) {
00446             (void) fprintf(stderr,
00447                            "Unique table %d is not the right power of 2\n", i);
00448             (void) fprintf(stderr,
00449                            "    slots = %u shift = %d\n", slots, shift);
00450         }
00451         totalSlots += slots;
00452         totalDead += dead;
00453         for (j = 0; (unsigned) j < slots; j++) {
00454             node = nodelist[j];
00455             if (node != NULL) {
00456                 nonEmpty++;
00457             }
00458             while (node != NULL) {
00459                 keys--;
00460                 if (node->ref == 0) {
00461                     dead--;
00462                 }
00463                 node = node->next;
00464             }
00465         }
00466         if (keys != 0) {
00467             (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong number of keys found \
00468 in unique table %d (difference=%d)\n", i, keys);
00469             count++;
00470         }
00471         if (dead != 0) {
00472             (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong number of dead found \
00473 in unique table no. %d (difference=%d)\n", i, dead);
00474         }
00475     }   /* for each BDD/ADD subtable */
00476 
00477     /* Check the ZDD subtables. */
00478     size = table->sizeZ;
00479 
00480     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00481         subtable = &(table->subtableZ[i]);
00482         nodelist = subtable->nodelist;
00483         keys = subtable->keys;
00484         dead = subtable->dead;
00485         totalKeys += keys;
00486         totalSlots += subtable->slots;
00487         totalDead += dead;
00488         for (j = 0; (unsigned) j < subtable->slots; j++) {
00489             node = nodelist[j];
00490             if (node != NULL) {
00491                 nonEmpty++;
00492             }
00493             while (node != NULL) {
00494                 keys--;
00495                 if (node->ref == 0) {
00496                     dead--;
00497                 }
00498                 node = node->next;
00499             }
00500         }
00501         if (keys != 0) {
00502             (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong number of keys found \
00503 in ZDD unique table no. %d (difference=%d)\n", i, keys);
00504             count++;
00505         }
00506         if (dead != 0) {
00507             (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong number of dead found \
00508 in ZDD unique table no. %d (difference=%d)\n", i, dead);
00509         }
00510     }   /* for each ZDD subtable */
00511 
00512     /* Check the constant table. */
00513     subtable = &(table->constants);
00514     nodelist = subtable->nodelist;
00515     keys = subtable->keys;
00516     dead = subtable->dead;
00517     totalKeys += keys;
00518     totalSlots += subtable->slots;
00519     totalDead += dead;
00520     for (j = 0; (unsigned) j < subtable->slots; j++) {
00521         node = nodelist[j];
00522         if (node != NULL) {
00523             nonEmpty++;
00524         }
00525         while (node != NULL) {
00526             keys--;
00527             if (node->ref == 0) {
00528                 dead--;
00529             }
00530             node = node->next;
00531         }
00532     }
00533     if (keys != 0) {
00534         (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong number of keys found \
00535 in the constant table (difference=%d)\n", keys);
00536         count++;
00537     }
00538     if (dead != 0) {
00539         (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong number of dead found \
00540 in the constant table (difference=%d)\n", dead);
00541     }
00542     if ((unsigned) totalKeys != table->keys + table->keysZ) {
00543         (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong number of total keys found \
00544 (difference=%d)\n", totalKeys-table->keys);
00545     }
00546     if ((unsigned) totalSlots != table->slots) {
00547         (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong number of total slots found \
00548 (difference=%d)\n", totalSlots-table->slots);
00549     }
00550     if (table->minDead != (table->gcPercent * table->slots) / 100) {
00551         (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong number of minimum dead found \
00552 (%d vs. %d)\n", table->minDead, (table->gcPercent * table->slots) / 100);
00553     }
00554     if ((unsigned) totalDead != table->dead + table->deadZ) {
00555         (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong number of total dead found \
00556 (difference=%d)\n", totalDead-table->dead);
00557     }
00558     (void)printf("Average length of non-empty lists = %g\n",
00559     (double) table->keys / (double) nonEmpty);
00560 
00561     return(count);
00562 
00563 } /* end of Cudd_CheckKeys */

00593 int
00594 cuddHeapProfile(
00595   DdManager * dd)
00596 {
00597     int ntables = dd->size;
00598     DdSubtable *subtables = dd->subtables;
00599     int i,              /* loop index */
00600         nodes,          /* live nodes in i-th layer */
00601         retval,         /* return value of fprintf */
00602         largest = -1,   /* index of the table with most live nodes */
00603         maxnodes = -1,  /* maximum number of live nodes in a table */
00604         nonempty = 0;   /* number of tables with live nodes */
00605 
00606     /* Print header. */
00607 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00608     retval = fprintf(stdout,"*** DD heap profile for 0x%lx ***\n", (unsigned long) dd);
00609 #else
00610     retval = fprintf(stdout,"*** DD heap profile for 0x%x ***\n", (unsigned) dd);
00611 #endif
00612     if (retval == EOF) return 0;
00613 
00614     /* Print number of live nodes for each nonempty table. */
00615     for (i=0; i<ntables; i++) {
00616         nodes = subtables[i].keys - subtables[i].dead;
00617         if (nodes) {
00618             nonempty++;
00619             retval = fprintf(stdout,"%5d: %5d nodes\n", i, nodes);
00620             if (retval == EOF) return 0;
00621             if (nodes > maxnodes) {
00622                 maxnodes = nodes;
00623                 largest = i;
00624             }
00625         }
00626     }
00627 
00628     nodes = dd->constants.keys - dd->constants.dead;
00629     if (nodes) {
00630         nonempty++;
00631         retval = fprintf(stdout,"const: %5d nodes\n", nodes);
00632         if (retval == EOF) return 0;
00633         if (nodes > maxnodes) {
00634             maxnodes = nodes;
00635             largest = CUDD_MAXINDEX;
00636         }
00637     }
00638 
00639     /* Print summary. */
00640     retval = fprintf(stdout,"Summary: %d tables, %d non-empty, largest: %d ",
00641           ntables+1, nonempty, largest);
00642     if (retval == EOF) return 0;
00643     retval = fprintf(stdout,"(with %d nodes)\n", maxnodes);
00644     if (retval == EOF) return 0;
00645 
00646     return(1);
00647 
00648 } /* end of cuddHeapProfile */
00649 
00650 
00662 void
00663 cuddPrintNode(
00664   DdNode * f)
00665 {
00666     f = Cudd_Regular(f);
00667 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00668     (void) fprintf(stdout,"       node 0x%lx, id = %d, ref = %d, then = 0x%lx, else = 0x%lx\n",(unsigned long)f,f->index,f->ref,(unsigned long)cuddT(f),(unsigned long)cuddE(f));
00669 #else
00670     (void) fprintf(stdout,"       node 0x%x, id = %d, ref = %d, then = 0x%x, else = 0x%x\n",(unsigned)f,f->index,f->ref,(unsigned)cuddT(f),(unsigned)cuddE(f));
00671 #endif
00672 
00673 } /* end of cuddPrintNode */

00680 
00692 static void
00693 debugFindParent(
00694   DdManager * table,
00695   DdNode * node)
00696 {
00697     int         i,j;
00698     int         slots;
00699 #ifdef __osf__
00700 #pragma pointer_size save
00701 #pragma pointer_size short
00702 #endif
00703     DdNode      **nodelist,*f;
00704 #ifdef __osf__
00705 #pragma pointer_size restore
00706 #endif
00707         
00708     for (i = 0; i < cuddI(table,node->index); i++) {
00709         nodelist = table->subtables[i].nodelist;
00710         slots = table->subtables[i].slots;
00711 
00712         for (j=0;j<slots;j++) {
00713             f = nodelist[j];
00714             while (f != NULL) {
00715                 if (cuddT(f) == node || Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f)) == node) {
00716 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00717                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"parent is at 0x%lx, id = %d, ref = %d, then = 0x%lx, else = 0x%lx\n",
00718                         (unsigned long)f,f->index,f->ref,(unsigned long)cuddT(f),(unsigned long)cuddE(f));
00719 #else
00720                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"parent is at 0x%x, id = %d, ref = %d, then = 0x%x, else = 0x%x\n",
00721                         (unsigned)f,f->index,f->ref,(unsigned)cuddT(f),(unsigned)cuddE(f));
00722 #endif
00723                 }
00724                 f = f->next;
00725             }
00726         }
00727     }
00728 
00729 } /* end of debugFindParent */

00732 #if 0
00733 
00745 static void
00746 debugCheckParent(
00747   DdManager * table,
00748   DdNode * node)
00749 {
00750     int         i,j;
00751     int         slots;
00752     DdNode      **nodelist,*f;
00753     
00754     for (i = 0; i < cuddI(table,node->index); i++) {
00755         nodelist = table->subtables[i].nodelist;
00756         slots = table->subtables[i].slots;
00757 
00758         for (j=0;j<slots;j++) {
00759             f = nodelist[j];
00760             while (f != NULL) {
00761                 if ((Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f)) == node || cuddT(f) == node) && f->ref != 0) {
00762                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"error with zero ref count\n");
00763                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"parent is 0x%x, id = %d, ref = %d, then = 0x%x, else = 0x%x\n",f,f->index,f->ref,cuddT(f),cuddE(f));
00764                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"child  is 0x%x, id = %d, ref = %d, then = 0x%x, else = 0x%x\n",node,node->index,node->ref,cuddT(node),cuddE(node));
00765                 }
00766                 f = f->next;
00767             }
00768         }
00769     }
00770 }
00771 #endif
00772
